text: Anyone noticed an extreme increase in latency between uploading or publishing a file and seeing the effects live? Say I'm updating my css, it'll take anywhere from 5-20 minutes to see the updated css. Keep in mind we're clearing caches and everything in between, so it's not a cache issue, and it's happening across all our webs. Everything is suddenly so slow that my entire team has their panties in a twist (including me, absolutely)
